meanings.definition: A person who indulges in something, especially food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The indulgers at the party enjoyed the delicious cake.
meanings.sent2: The indulgers in the group always order extra desserts.
meanings.sent3: The indulgers at the picnic were the first to reach for the snacks.
meanings.sent4: Among the crowd, the indulgers stood out like shining stars in a dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The indulgers savored every bite of the decadent chocolate.

meanings.definition: Those who allow themselves to enjoy something, often to excess.
meanings.sent1: The indulgers in the movie theater had large tubs of popcorn.
meanings.sent2: During the holidays, the indulgers indulged in festive treats.
meanings.sent3: The indulgers at the buffet piled their plates high with goodies.
meanings.sent4: In the game of moderation, the indulgers were the champions.
meanings.sent5: The indulgers reveled in the abundance of flavors at the feast.
